entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
